message.body: It turns out you don't need all that stuff you insisted you did. Please tell me you don't work in a morgue.
Grape jelly was leaking out the hole in the roof. Going from child, to childish, to childlike is only a matter of time.
He had reached the point where he was paranoid about being paranoid. A song can make or ruin a personâ€™s day if they let it get to them.
